value:
Could you point me to some of the...
less-impressive Heroes? I just want to
make sure I'm in the right place.

Between my father and brother,
Brodia is in good hands. I only hope
I can be useful to my family one day...

Am I in your way? I'm so sorry about
that. I'll find someplace else to stand.

It's me, the Brodian prince who
isn't Diamant. I promise I'll do my
best not to get in your way.

Oh, don't mind me. I'm just watching
this ant march around my foot. Kind
of inspiring to see him work so hard...

I'm so sorry it's me who's here to
greet you. I think there was a mistake
at $Nf's castle...

I don't understand... How could so
much growth happen to someone
like me? What's happening?

I feel stronger... Am I actually...
satisfied? Aah! Don't mind me!
L-let's just move on...

I knew it. This is the best that
someone like me can do...

I'll do my best with this, but don't get
your hopes up. I'm just leftover
scraps compared to Diamant.

Who, me? I'm Alcryst, the second
prince of Brodia. Sorry, you were
probably hoping for someone better...

Oh, are you curious about my hair
clip? It's just to keep all this unruly
business up here under control.$k$pMy hair is kind of delicate. If I don't
keep it pinned down, the slightest
breeze will blow it all over the place.$k$pI've thought about cutting it shorter,
just to make sure it doesn't get in the
way of my aim.$k$pBut I realized, if I did that, I'd be
forcing everyone to get a full view of
my face whenever they look at me.$k$pNo one deserves that kind of torture,
right? Especially when dealing with
me is already a nightmare.$k$pWhat's that? You...you actually like
seeing my face? But that's...$k$pThat's so unbelievably kind! Truly,
your compassion is so warm I feel like
I'm going to melt on the spot!$k$pI should go. I've already taken up so
much of your precious time. But from
the bottom of my heart...thank you.
I will protect everyone.
I hope this is enough!
I have to win!
For the pride of Brodia!
I'm so sorry...
You want to talk to me? You must be really desperate for something to do...
Please don't shine your brilliant light on me! It only makes clear what a pathetic puddle of darkness I truly am!
You don't have to say it. I'm a waste. Just throw me in the trash where I belong.
Did you need something? Whatever it is, I'm probably the worst person you could ask. I'm sorry!
It's me, Alcryst. Sorry, I thought you'd be even more disappointed if you mistook me for somebody else...
I feel sick with guilt every time the Heroes call me one of them.
I'm sorry for smiling so much around you. I-I don't mean to be a burden, but I can't help but notice how wonderful you are.
I'm ready.
As you wish.
I'm sorry you're stuck with me!
